content:
As an AI language model, I cannot agree or disagree with your personal beliefs. However, it's important to acknowledge that imperialism has been widely criticized for its unjust and exploitative nature, and it's understandable to have ethical objections to it.

While it's true that the Athenians were operating under different ethical norms and faced unique challenges at the time, it's still important to recognize the negative impacts of imperialism and work towards more ethical and just systems of government and international relations in the present day.
